name: Cyber City 2157
description:
Now on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=631681176

Dive into the world of mysterious Molds and constantly changing Sun that never sets. Discover the stories hidden in the City. Get an idea what can lead to such results. We welcome You in the Cyber City 2157. Enjoy.

Thank you for playing with Harotobira ^__^


Features:

  1. 150 backgrounds
  2. Atmospheric music
  3. The total duration of the game more than 4 hours
  4. Dive into the amazing world of a mixture of mysticism and cyberpunk.

We are also welcome the support on Patreon. Our goals are listed there.

News:

21/02/2016 Release

23/02/2016 Update 1.1 release. Fix Mac version, some new animation added, russian language fix

23/02/2016 Fix payment

25/02/2016 Update 1.2 release. Some text fix add

29/02/2016 Update 1.3 release. New animation, sounds and music in first half of a game. English language fix

02/03/2016 Update 1.4 release. New music, text fix, some roads expansion.

Minimal System Requirement:

OS: Windows, Linux, Mac

Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP

RAM: 512 MB RAM

Video Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

DirectX: Version 9.0c

Disk space: 600 MB

Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
